title: MythicMobs报错
author: Lonewolfi
txt_content:
[22:12:28 [错误]: [MythicMobs] Task #5831 for MythicMobs v4.3.2-SNAPSHOT generated an exception
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at me.libraryaddict.disguise.disguisetypes.Disguise.setWatcher(Disguise.java:701) ~[?:?]
        at me.libraryaddict.disguise.disguisetypes.PlayerDisguise.setWatcher(PlayerDisguise.java:335) ~[?:?]
        at me.libraryaddict.disguise.disguisetypes.PlayerDisguise.clone(PlayerDisguise.java:112) ~[?:?]
        at me.libraryaddict.disguise.disguisetypes.PlayerDisguise.clone(PlayerDisguise.java:15) ~[?:?]
        at me.libraryaddict.disguise.DisguiseAPI.disguiseToAll(DisguiseAPI.java:255) ~[?:?]
        at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.compatibility.LibsDisguisesSupport$1.run(LibsDisguisesSupport.java:132) ~[?:?]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_11_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:58) ~[PaperSpigot-1.11.2-b1104.jar:git-Paper-1104]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_11_R1.scheduler.CraftScheduler.mainThreadHeartbeat(CraftScheduler.java:356) [PaperSpigot-1.11.2-b1104.jar:git-Paper-1104]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.MinecraftServer.D(MinecraftServer.java:829) [PaperSpigot-1.11.2-b1104.jar:git-Paper-1104]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.DedicatedServer.D(DedicatedServer.java:403) [PaperSpigot-1.11.2-b1104.jar:git-Paper-1104]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.MinecraftServer.C(MinecraftServer.java:763) [PaperSpigot-1.11.2-b1104.jar:git-Paper-1104]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:661) [PaperSpigot-1.11.2-b1104.jar:git-Paper-1104]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_161]


1.怪物伪装玩家皮肤，生成时服务端报错,伪装还会生效。(报错刷的太多了,生成一只刷一次占磁盘啊- -)
2.怪物伪装其他怪物,当玩家站在怪物旁边,有概率所有客户端都会崩溃,详情见另一贴(LibsDisguises插件问题)

这贴是第   1   个问题（paperspigot1.11.2   ,   MM怪和伪装插件都是最新版本）
